sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A godly sermon of Peter's repentance, after he had denyed his lord and master Jesus Christ, as it is in his repentance, he wept bitterly for his sins. / ... by a godly pastor. Hart, John, D.D.
The fourth ed. corrected and enlarged, and set forth for the good of all those that truly fear God.
[18] p.
Printed by B.W. and are to be sold by Eliz. Andrews in Little Saint Bartholomews Court in West-Smithfield, London : 1666.
Attributed to Hart by NUC pre-1956 imprints. Text in black letter. Advertisement: p. [18]. Lacks signature A8. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

The fourth ed. corrected and enlarged, and set forth for the good of all those that truly fear God.
[18] p.
Printed by B.W. and are to be sold by Eliz. Andrews in Little Saint Bartholomews Court in West-Smithfield, London : 1666.
Attributed to Hart by NUC pre-1956 imprints. Text in black letter. Advertisement: p. [18]. Lacks signature A8. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
